transcript: it's my belief that in order to be a truly good and transformational coach you have to develop the skill of helping people make decisions to help themselves and that's sales right and so i think the first step in coaching is being able to get people to prioritize that thing so that you can actually help them if you can't get them to believe you or to believe that they are worth it then you're not going to be a good coach and so i think it's the first step
